title: 40. Aquaberry Aquarius - Riff Raff & DJ Afterthought
text: Is hit me up a remake of vibe? Banger by b its jody highrollaa Riff Raff have stepped up his game fr... Very unique rapper. Biography Genre: Hip-Hop/Rap Years Active: '70s, '80s Weird and wild enough to be associated with Soulja Boy, Andy Milonakis, O.G. Ron C., and Diplo's Mad Decent crew, Houston rapper Riff Raff first came on the scene in 2009 as a contestant on MTV's From G's to Gents, a competitive reality series where hardcore ballers tried to become sophisticates. According to OutKast associate and the show's host Fonzworth Bentley, Riff Raff was "beyond" his help, but "crazy like a fox" was another way to think of it as the rapper had the MTV logo tattooed on his... Top Albums and Songs by Riff Raff 1.
